name: File extension
description: Do not strip out the file extension on URLs.

name: HTTPS
description: Security is a top priority for Google.

name: Hyphens
description: Split words using hyphens.

name: Localisation
description: Choose a country-specific domain, for better local search results.

name: Subdomain or subfolder
description: Subdomains are seen as separate domains.

name: URL builder
description: Use this tool to add custom campaign parameters to your URLs.

name: Custom Search
description: With Google Sitelink search box, people can reach your content more quickly.

name: Pagination
description: Implement the rel="next" and rel="prev" attributes to links.

name: Performance
description: Performance and loading time is important.

name: RichSnippets
description: Markup your code with rich snippets, they show up on the search results page.

name: Robots
description: Block pages which should not be indexed via the robots.txt file or

name: Validation: Write valid code (HTML Validator CSS Validator).
WAI-Aria
description: Use WAI-Aria tags to help machines understand your code.

name: Description
description: Each page should have a unique description (max. 160 characters)

name: Meta Tag
description: You can ommit the <meta name="keywords" content="">,

name: URL
description: Keyword should appear in URL name.

name: Uniqueness
description: Do not provide duplicated content, use unique content types.

name: Alt tag
description: Add an alt-tag this a description of the image (60 - 70 characters).

name: File name
description: Use a short descriptive name.

name: Optimization
description: Optimize images by removing some meta information.

name: Responsive Images
description: Serve the most optimized image corresponding to the window size.

name: Unplayable content
description: Avoid unplayable video content. Use HTML5 <video> tag instead of Flash.

name: Languages
description: The hreflang tag tells Google which language you are using on a specific page, so the search engine can serve that result to users searching in that language

name: nofollow
description: Add rel="nofollow" attribute to external links only to prevent spam and bad links.

name: AppLinks
description: Apps that link to your content can then use this metadata to deep-link into your app.

name: mobile friendly
description: Mobile optimized sites are marked in search results. Test for mobile friendly site.

name: Smart App Banner
description: Safari has a Smart App Banner feature that provides a standardized method of promoting apps on the App Store from a website.

name: Tap targets
description: Clickable links should not be too small.

name: HTML sitemap
description: A HTML sitemap allows site visitors to easily navigate a website.

name: Image sitemap
description: Increase that your images can be found in Image Search results.

name: Mobile sitemap
description: For feature phones, you can create a mobile sitemap.

name: Video sitemap
description: Make sure, search engines know about all the video content on your site.

name: XML sitemap
description: Help search engines to index your pages.

name: Facebook

name: OpenGraph

description: Allows webmasters to add their websites to the Bing index crawler.
